item.title: 首席执行官塔瓦雷斯离开 Stellantis，市场猜测继任者人选
item.description: 卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）在周日突然辞去 Stellantis 首席执行官一职，两个月前该公司曾发布盈利预警，该汽车制造商表示将在明年上半年任命一位永久继任者。【原文：Carlos Tavares abruptly resigned on Sunday as CEO of Stellantis , two months after a profit warning, and the carmaker said it would seek to appoint a permanent successor in the first half of next year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Stellantis 考虑由 Picat 和 Filosa 担任首席执行官
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士周一透露，Stellantis 董事会正在考虑将其北美业务主管 Antonio Filosa 和采购主管 Maxime Picat 作为首席执行官职位的内部候选人。【原文：The board of Stellantis is considering its head of North American operations, Antonio Filosa, and procurement chief Maxime Picat as internal candidates for the CEO position, a source close to the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 综述 大型对冲基金因特朗普当选而获益
item.description: 路透社获得的数据显示，尽管紧张的民调使投资组合经理更难进行定位，但美国总统大选的动荡局势使许多价值数十亿美元的对冲基金在 11 月份获得了收益。【原文：A number of multi-billion dollar hedge funds gained in November, numbers obtained by Reuters show, riding the volatility of the U.S. presidential election despite tight polling making positioning more difficult for portfolio managers.】

item.title: 苹果公司被控压制员工、监视个人设备
item.description: 苹果公司在一项新的诉讼中被指控非法监控其员工的个人设备和 iCloud 账户，同时还禁止他们讨论自己的薪酬和工作条件。【原文：Apple has been accused in a new lawsuit of illegally monitoring its workers' personal devices and iCloud accounts while also barring them from discussing their pay and working conditions.】

item.title: PG&E启动24亿美元股权融资后股价下跌
item.description: 周一，PG&E 公司股价下跌约 7%，此前这家电力和天然气公司宣布计划通过发行股票向投资者筹集 24 亿美元。【原文：Shares of PG&E Corp fell about 7% on Monday after the power and natural gas company announced that it planned to raise $2.4 billion from investors via a stock offering.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克：通胀率继续下降的基本情况不变
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周一表示，他对是否在美联储 12 月会议上再次降息持开放态度，即将公布的就业数据将对这一决定产生重要影响。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Monday he has an open mind about whether to cut interest rates again at the Fed's December meeting, with upcoming data on jobs important in shaping the decision.】

item.title: 从波音到英特尔：2024 年全球主要公司 CEO 离职情况
item.description: 今年，包括飞机制造商波音公司和陷入困境的芯片制造商英特尔公司在内的几家全球性公司的首席执行官相继离职，少数几家公司选择了经验丰富的高管来填补这些领导层的空缺。【原文：Several global companies, including aircraft manufacturer Boeing and struggling chipmaker Intel, have witnessed the departure of their CEO's this year, with a handful of firms opting for seasoned executives to fill these leadership voids.】

item.title: 消息人士称，塔瓦雷斯就复兴计划与 Stellantis 董事会发生冲突
item.description: 即将离任的首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）与 Stellantis 董事会发生冲突，原因是他计划通过削减成本，而不是专注于长期战略，来迅速扭转美国业务萎靡不振的局面。【原文：Outgoing CEO Carlos Tavares clashed with Stellantis' board over his plans to quickly turn around the ailing U.S. business by cutting costs, rather than focusing on long-term strategy, investors and bankers familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 花旗银行在 Banamex 首次公开募股前完成墨西哥业务分拆
item.description: 华尔街巨头花旗集团周一表示，在准备将墨西哥 Banamex 零售银行上市之际，花旗集团已经完成了将该银行从其在墨西哥的机构银行业务中分离出来的工作。【原文：Citigroup has completed the separation of Banamex from its institutional banking business in Mexico as it prepares to list the retail bank, the Wall Street giant said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份建筑支出超出预期
item.description: 受单户住宅建设的推动，10 月份美国建筑支出的增幅超过预期。【原文：U.S. construction spending increased more than expected in October, boosted by single-family homebuilding.】

item.title: 面临增长挑战，Bumble 首席财务官明年卸任
item.description: Bumble 周一表示，Anu Subramanian 将从 2025 年 3 月 14 日起辞去首席财务官一职。【原文：Bumble said on Monday Anu Subramanian will step down as chief financial officer, effective March 14, 2025.】

item.title: 美国 11 月制造业有所改善，订单反弹，投入价格涨幅放缓
item.description: 11 月份，美国制造业活动有所改善，订单八个月来首次出现增长，工厂面临的投入品价格大幅下降。【原文：U.S. manufacturing activity improved in November, with orders growing for the first time in eight months and factories facing significantly lower prices for inputs.】

item.title: 阿斯麦尔预计美国出口限制不会打击芯片行业的长期需求
item.description: 计算机芯片设备制造商阿斯麦公司（ASML）周一表示，预计美国新的出口限制措施不会长期打击半导体行业的需求。【原文：Computer chip equipment maker ASML does not expect new U.S. export restrictions to hit demand in the semiconductor industry in the long term, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国建议向 Stellantis 和三星 SDI 电池合资企业提供 75.4 亿美元贷款
item.description: 美国能源部周一表示，拟向汽车制造商 Stellantis 和三星 SDI 的合资企业提供高达 75.4 亿美元的贷款，帮助其在印第安纳州建设两座电动汽车锂离子电池工厂。【原文：The U.S. Energy Department said Monday it is proposing to loan up to $7.54 billion to a joint venture of automaker Stellantis and Samsung SDI to help build two electric vehicle lithium-ion battery plants in Indiana.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Worldline吸引了私募股权公司的早期投资兴趣
item.description: 五位知情人士透露，法国支付集团 Worldline 已吸引了私募股权公司的早期收购兴趣，因为该公司正努力应对股价下跌、利润预警和领导层变动等问题。【原文：French payments group Worldline has attracted early stage takeover interest from private equity firms, as it grapples with a falling share price, profit warnings and leadership change, five people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国零售商瞄准 "网络星期一"，推出大幅在线折扣活动
item.description: 在 "黑色星期五"（Black Friday）上，美国商店的消费乏善可陈，而在感恩节长周末之后，零售商们将在其网站和应用程序上推出各种促销活动，吸引人们购买节日礼物和其他商品。【原文：After lackluster spending at U.S. stores on a deals-heavy Black Friday, retailers will be pulling out all the stops with steep promotions on their websites and apps to entice people to buy holiday gifts and other merchandise after the long Thanksgiving weekend.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格将退休
item.description: 芯片制造商英特尔公司周一表示，首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）将从公司退休。【原文：Chipmaker Intel said on Monday CEO Pat Gelsinger will retire from the company.】

item.title: Uber 在克什米尔风景优美的达尔湖上推出游船叫车服务
item.description: 周一，优步（Uber）在印度克什米尔地区风景秀丽的达尔湖（Dal Lake）上推出了水上交通叫车服务，提供游客喜爱的游船搭乘服务。【原文：Uber launched a water transport hailing service on scenic Dal Lake in India's Kashmir region on Monday, offering rides on boats popular with tourists.】

item.title: 巴西 "黑色星期五 "的即时支付交易量翻了一番多
item.description: 巴西中央银行周一的数据显示，巴西流行的即时支付系统 Pix 在 "黑色星期五 "当天记录的交易额比上一年猛增 120.7%。【原文：Brazil's popular instant payment system Pix saw a 120.7% jump in the value of transactions recorded on Black Friday compared to the previous year, central bank data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 亚马逊将试用人工智能设计的除碳材料
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc）计划为数据中心试用一种新的碳清除材料，该交易背后的一家初创公司周一表示，数据中心所使用的人工智能系统有可能导致排放恶化。【原文：Amazon.com Inc plans to pilot a new carbon-removal material for data centers, which are at risk of worsening emissions from artificial intelligence systems they power, a startup behind the deal said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空中客车公司 11 月飞机交付量突破 80 架
item.description: 业内人士称，随着空中客车公司从低迷中复苏，并在实现年终目标方面取得进展，该公司11月份的飞机交付量大幅上升，达到80多架。【原文：Airbus deliveries rose sharply in November to more than 80 jets as the planemaker recovered from a downturn and made progress towards year-end targets, industry sources said.】

item.title: 特朗普的低油价承诺对新兴市场既是风险也是利好
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺 "钻井，宝贝，钻井"，将能源成本减半，这一计划让那些担心美元收益的新兴市场产油国政府不寒而栗，同时也让较贫穷的进口国充满希望。【原文：Donald Trump has promised to "drill, baby, drill" to halve energy costs, a plan that sends shivers through the governments of emerging market oil producers anxious about dollar earnings and fills poorer importing countries with hope.】

item.title: 波罗的海航空公司最早将于 2025 年上半年上市
item.description: 波罗的海航空公司（AirBaltic）首席执行官周一告诉路透社，目前预计该公司最早将于2025年上半年进行首次公开募股，因为该公司的顾问建议其等待欧洲航空业的市场条件改善。【原文：AirBaltic's initial public offering is now expected at the earliest in the first half of 2025, its chief executive told Reuters on Monday, as the airline's advisors suggest it waits for market conditions in the European airline sector to improve.】

item.title: 英伟达是人工智能公司 Nebius Group 7 亿美元融资的投资者之一
item.description: 人工智能基础设施公司Nebius集团周一表示，该公司将从包括英伟达（Nvidia）、Accel和Orbis Investments管理的一些账户在内的投资者处私募融资7亿美元。【原文：AI infrastructure firm Nebius Group on Monday said it was raising $700 million in a private placement from investors including Nvidia , Accel and some accounts managed by Orbis Investments.】

item.title: 中欧贸易紧张局势下赛诺菲宣布最大对华投资协议
item.description: 赛诺菲公司周一表示，该公司计划投资约10亿欧元（10.5亿美元）在北京新建一个胰岛素生产基地，这将是这家法国制药商在中国最大的单笔投资。【原文：Sanofi plans to invest around 1 billion euros ($1.05 billion) to build a new insulin production base in Beijing, which will mark the French drugmaker's largest single investment in China, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道孟加拉因付款纠纷减半从印度阿达尼公司购电
item.description: 孟加拉国政府官员周一告诉路透社记者，由于在高达数亿美元的会费问题上存在分歧，孟加拉国已将从邻国印度阿达尼电力公司（Adani Power）购买的电力减半，理由是冬季需求减少。【原文：Bangladesh has halved the power it buys from neighbouring India's Adani Power, citing lower winter demand, government officials told Reuters on Monday, amid disagreements over dues running into hundreds of millions of dollars.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔可能让美国货币政策再次变得枯燥乏味
item.description: 在过去 17 年的大部分时间里，美联储一直是美国经济政策的核心参与者，为金融体系提供了数万亿美元的安全网，提供了近十年的超低价货币，在 COVID-19 大流行期间跳过了红线，并在公平和气候变化等领域做出了更多努力。【原文：For much of the past 17 years the Federal Reserve has been the central player in U.S. economic policy, throwing multi-trillion-dollar safety nets under the financial system, offering nearly a decade of ultra-cheap money, jumping redlines during the COVID-19 pandemic, and delving more into areas like equity and climate change.】

item.title: 美国 美元因特朗普言论、法国政治和人民币汇率下滑而走软
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 加拿大银行第四季度盈利喜忧参半，房贷续期和降息迫在眉睫
item.description: 加拿大六大银行中有四家预计第四季度盈利将出现增长，因为在降息、大量抵押贷款续期以及边境南部新政府上台的背景下，海湾街（Bay Street）将注意力转向了贷款机构对新一年的预测。【原文：Four out of Canada's six largest banks are expected to show a rise in earnings for the fourth quarter as Bay Street turns its focus to the lenders' forecasts for the new year amid interest rate cuts, a slew of mortgage renewals and a new government south of the border.】

item.title: 如果天气允许，UPS 和联邦快递将准时投递美国节日礼物
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）和联邦快递公司（FedEx）等包裹递送公司受到需求疲软的困扰，这对于希望快速、准时送达节日礼物的美国网购者来说无疑是个好消息。【原文：The weak demand bedeviling package delivery companies like United Parcel Service and FedEx promises to be great news for online U.S. shoppers who want quick, on-time holiday gift delivery.】
